PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-04012017-04-13,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectExtending Time Limit - Lake Erie Connector Project by ITC Lake Erie Connector LLC
PrecisOrder extending the legislated time limit for approving or refusing the ISSUANCE of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity EC-056 by the National Energy Board to ITC LAKE ERIE CONNECTOR LLC for the construction and operation of the Lake Erie Connector Project, by seventy-two days, from April 19, 2017 to June 30, 2017.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
